titleStmt.title: A view of that part of the late considerations addrest to H.H. about the Trinity which concerns the sober enquiry, on that subject : in a letter to the former friend.
titleStmt.author: Howe, John, 1630-1705.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Howe by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
